title: Soy Mince & Aubergine Bake
method: Prep: finely chop the aubergine and slice the carrots.
Heat 1 tbsp oil in a wok over high heat.
Stir-fry soy mince 5–6 min; add veg and sauce; cook 3–4 min more.
Rest meat 3–5 min if applicable. Season to taste with lemon, herbs, and chili to preference.
Plate as suggested below and enjoy.
plating: Serve soy mince neatly over grains with veg to one side; finish with chopped rosemary, a wedge of lemon, and a drizzle of olive oil for a clean Welsh presentation.
hydrationTip: Add 300–500 ml water with the meal, more if training on the day.
swaps: Swap grains for cauliflower rice for lower carbs.
Use tofu or chicken interchangeably to suit dietary preference.
Add chili to taste for more heat.

title: Chickpeas & Sweetcorn Traybake
method: Prep: finely chop the sweetcorn and slice the carrots.
Preheat to 190°C.
Toss chickpeas with oil, salt, pepper and spices; spread on a tray with veg.
Air-fry for 29–35 minutes until chickpeas is cooked through (75°C internal for poultry).
Rest meat 3–5 min if applicable. Season to taste with lemon, herbs, and chili to preference.
Plate as suggested below and enjoy.
plating: Serve chickpeas neatly over grains with veg to one side; finish with chopped mint, a wedge of lemon, and a drizzle of olive oil for a clean Scottish presentation.
hydrationTip: Add 300–500 ml water with the meal, more if training on the day.
swaps: Swap grains for cauliflower rice for lower carbs.
Use tofu or chicken interchangeably to suit dietary preference.
Add chili to taste for more heat.
